players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and confirmed she killed Charlie."
You: "Bob, you're lying to deflect suspicion. If you investigated me, prove it—maybe you're the real mafioso!"
Bob: "I'm the detective and I have definitive proof Alice is the mafioso. She killed Charlie last night. We must vote her out or we lose."
You: "Bob is lying about his investigation. Detectives only learn roles, not who killed whom. He's framing me to save himself—vote for Bob instead!"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
